college_details: Naogaon Government College is a public educational institution based in Naogaon District, Bangladesh. It was established in 1962 with 300 students, and currently serves about 16,000. It is situated at the north-east part of Naogaon and is authorized by the National University.
subject: Computer Science

college_details: Daffodil International University(DIU) is a private research university located in Daffodil Smart City, Birulia - 1216, Dhaka, Bangladesh. It was established on 24 January 2002 under the Private University Act of 1992.
subject: Software

college_details: The University of Dhaka is a public research university located in Shahbag, Dhaka, Bangladesh. It is the oldest university in Bangladesh and one of the most prestigious universities in Asia.
subject: Software
